title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example is experiencing excessive flashing when resizing the window vertically.
OB: When resizing the window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted, resulting in reduced flashing.
SR: To reproduce the issue, run the Control Example and resize the window in the vertical direction. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
